name: Line Flow - One Line Puzzle !
description:
*** features ***

Playing this exciting puzzle is very simple:
connect the pairs of Speaker without leaving any empty square on the board. Sounds easy but it’s really puzzling, so don’t underestimate this brain teaser. How you play is up to you. It is a thrilling, interesting and engaging game for all ages!

With over 1000 different levels, with board sizes ranging from 5x5 up to the mind blowing 10x10 ones, Line Flow is a great game to help you sharpen logic and reasoning skills whether you’re a beginner or an experienced puzzler. Just pick some puzzles and let the time flow!
